name: ebug
description: A mini NodeJS debug module based on https://github.com/visionmedia/debug. Has colorized output in terminal for namespaces, formatted output, and millisecond timestamps between calls within the same module.
author: Tom Shaver <l3l_aze@yahoo.com>

scripts.test-everything: DEBUG=ebug* node ./tests/test.js && DEBUG=ebug* node ./tests/test-namespacePrefix.js && DEBUG=ebug* node ./tests/test-realTime.js && DEBUG=ebug* node ./tests/test-useColors.js && DEBUG=ebug* node ./tests/test-wideSpacing.js && DEBUG=ebug* node ./tests/test-rtucws.js && DEBUG=ebug* node ./tests/test-all.js && DEBUG=ebug*,'h|i','H"i','h^i','h**i',ebug*,'h__i','h--i' node ./tests/test-errors.js
